name: Mom and Baby Care - Cute Newborn Baby Sleeping and Home Adventure
name_original: Mom and Baby Care - Cute Newborn Baby Sleeping and Home Adventure
description:
Get ready to take care of your baby it is fun and home adventure game on App Store!

Awesome musical instruments of baby sounds very sweet and baby sounding very lovely in bed room.

Have you ever played baby care games ? Do you love babies to take care? Want to play with your baby? Want to take care of your baby? Let's start here; you will be excited playing this Mom and baby jake care game!
It’s super easy to play this game. There are 2 options to choose when you start the game play.
1. Play in the Bedroom
2. Play in the Playground
In the bedroom, you can choose any characters between two to play with. Now it’s your turn to take care of your new baby. Isn’t she so cute! Yes, she is!
Confused? What to do? There are many things to do for your baby. You can change the bed sheet, there are lots of beautiful bed sheet available. You can also change the pillow cover. You can change her hair style also. You can also change her dress.
Finally you can let her sleep. As she is so cute, she will go to sleep when you will turn the light off!
Now, let’s go to the playground when the baby is awake. Your baby likes playing with balls and she wants to kick the balls. Let’s start playing. Slide the ball to the board. Keep in mind the wind speed and direction. Reach as many levels you can! This is exciting, super exciting!


Exciting Mom & Baby Care Game Features:
- Easy to control
- Advanced AI players
- Intuitive interface
- HD graphics
- Realistic baby sounds
- Unlimited playing
- Baby room makeover
- Baby home adventure
- Awesome musical instruments of baby.

Remember! This is addictive; too much addictive!
Don't be late! Download the baby care game right now and take care of your sweet baby!!
